items.sentence: My opinion is completely different from yours.
Our country is going through a difficult time.
Please just tell me what it is you want to do.
I must get this work finished by next Tuesday.
I suspect Tom will probably regret doing that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary did that together.
I suspect that Tom is a cold-blooded murderer.
I couldn\'t put up with that noise any longer.
I didn\'t expect such a nice present from you.
I didn\'t expect that Mary would come so soon.
